name: Splash! (PronoesPro)
description:
(Here is an easier and bug fixed version: https://drive.google.com/open?id=1fYx6SJCwBMUxO41SUmYaWQ5HZEZpiyJa)

Play a charming little adventure as a little drop of water and help it find its home and family.

The "cycle" that was the theme of the gamejam is the cycle of water.

Tutorial: If you touch mud while being water, fly too high or fall into a pit, you lose (meaning you don't find your home).

                   -Up: turn into a cloud and fly up in the sky (press down to  to go back). Keep pressing it to go faster!

                   -Down: turn into an ice cube and become immune to mud.

                   -Normal state: go up rocks, go faster than as an ice cube.
